headline: TJX Companies Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) reported fourth-quarter fiscal 2026 results that management said were “well above” expectations, citing broad-based comparable sales growth, improved margins, and continued customer traffic gains across most banners. headline: TJX Outlook Remains Solid as Baird Updates Model after Earnings Report
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is included among the 13 Best Performing Long Term Stocks to Invest in. On February 26, Baird analyst Mark Altschwager raised the firm’s price objective on The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) to $172 from $168. It reiterated an Outperform rating on the shares.
